name: NUT UPS
author: networkupstools
description: Network UPS Tools (NUT) is an open-source solution that provides support for monitoring and managing uninterruptible power supplies (UPS), power distribution units (PDU), and other power devices. It offers a server-client architecture, allowing multiple systems to access power status and initiate safe shutdowns when necessary. NUT supports a wide range of UPS models and integrates with various systems for automated power management.
short_desc: NUT (Network UPS Tools) is an open-source power management system that monitors and controls UPS devices, ensuring reliable power status and automated shutdowns.
